conversations.description: Attorney uploads a zipped 10‑GB email archive from a corporate litigation, receives a batch ID, and asks the system to confirm successful ingestion.
Paralegal runs a Boolean search for "non‑disclosure agreement" AND "termination" within PDF contracts dated between 2020‑01‑01 and 2022‑12‑31.
User requests a short summary of a 200‑page deposition transcript identified by doc‑ID 4521.
Legal team tags document 7839 with semantic labels "privilege" and "attorney‑client communication" and asks for a confidence score.
Associate asks the system to retrieve up to five California appellate decisions on “electronically stored information” with the keyword “Bates‑type”.
Senior counsel generates a Requests for Production referencing three previously tagged privileged emails and includes two case‑law citations.
Junior lawyer searches for all text‑message logs containing the phrase "meeting at" within a specific date range for a fraud investigation.
Partner requests a medium‑length summary of a heavily redacted PDF contract to quickly assess its relevance.
Paralegal asks the AI to apply the tag "confidential" to a batch of 50 documents identified by a common prefix in their IDs.
User wants to export a generated discovery request as a DOCX file for inclusion in the court filing bundle.
Attorney queries for all documents marked as "email" that mention the term "board resolution" and were sent after June 1 2021.
Legal analyst requests a long‑form summary of a multi‑jurisdictional settlement agreement to extract key obligations.
User asks the system to find relevant federal case law on “work‑product doctrine” and provide citation strings for a memorandum.
Counsel ingests a remote tar archive containing scanned fax communications and asks for OCR‑enabled indexing confirmation.
Associate runs a search for documents containing the phrase "material adverse effect" and filters results to only Word documents.
Paralegal requests the AI to add a custom tag "e‑discovery‑relevant" with a confidence of 0.92 to document ID 6672.
Attorney asks for a concise (short) summary of a court order that was served via email to assess immediate compliance steps.
Legal team wants to retrieve up to ten New York Supreme Court opinions on “protective order” to cite in a motion to compel.
User generates a set of interrogatories based on evidence IDs 101, 202, and 303, with additional instruction to limit each question to 150 words.
Partner asks the system to export a consolidated PDF of all summaries for documents tagged "contract" in the last 30 days.
Junior associate searches for any PDFs mentioning "force majeure" within the contract corpus, returning up to 15 hits.
Counsel asks the AI to tag document 8821 as both "privilege" and "work‑product" and to explain the reasoning.
Paralegal requests a medium‑length summary of a 50‑page settlement annex to quickly identify escrow terms.
User retrieves case‑law citations for a federal district court on “electronic discovery rules” with keywords "Rule 26" and "preservation".
Attorney generates a Requests for Admission referencing three specific emails and includes a citation to a relevant Ninth Circuit decision.
Legal analyst asks to export the generated discovery request as a PDF with embedded hyperlinks to the cited cases.
Associate runs a full‑text search for the phrase "stock option" limited to documents dated in 2021 and receives a list of document IDs.
Paralegal requests a short summary of a 10‑page internal memo to determine if it contains privileged communications.
Senior counsel asks the system to tag all documents containing the word "settlement" with the tag "potential‑evidence".
User seeks federal case law on “spoliation sanctions” and asks the AI to return the top three holdings for briefing.
Attorney generates a draft Request for Production for documents related to “vendor invoices” and includes a custom instruction to limit disclosure to the past five years.
Partner asks to export a batch of summaries for all privileged emails into a single DOCX file for attorney review.
Paralegal searches for all documents of type "pdf" that contain the exact phrase "non‑compete clause" and were created after January 1 2020.
Junior lawyer requests a long‑form summary of a complex antitrust settlement agreement to extract compliance timelines.
User retrieves up to five Texas Supreme Court opinions on “protective order” and asks for concise holdings.
Attorney tags a group of 20 documents as "confidential" and asks the system to verify that no privileged tags were inadvertently omitted.
Counsel runs a search for any mention of "indemnification" within the contract corpus, limiting results to the most recent 12 months.
Paralegal requests a short summary of a cease‑and‑desist letter to evaluate its relevance to the current case.
Associate asks the AI to retrieve case law on “email preservation obligations” from the federal appellate courts.
Senior counsel generates a Requests for Production that cites three specific case‑law precedents and references evidence IDs 555, 777, and 999.
User requests export of the generated discovery request as a PDF with a secure download link that expires in 24 hours.
Paralegal searches for all documents labeled "contract" that also contain the term "termination fee" and returns the top 10 matches.
Attorney asks for a medium‑length summary of a 150‑page litigation hold notice to confirm scope of preservation.
Legal team retrieves New York case law on “electronic discovery privilege” with keywords "E‑discovery" and "privilege waiver".
Junior associate requests the system to tag a newly ingested document as "privilege" with a confidence score of 0.85.
Partner generates a draft Interrogatory set referencing five evidence IDs and requests inclusion of a specific citation to a 2022 federal ruling.
Paralegal asks the AI to summarize a 30‑page memorandum of law in a short (1‑2 sentence) format for a quick briefing.
Counsel runs a full‑text search for the exact phrase "material breach" within the email archive and filters results to the last six months.
Attorney requests export of all tagged "privileged" documents into a secured PDF bundle for court filing.
Legal analyst asks the system to retrieve up to eight appellate opinions on “electronic metadata preservation” across multiple jurisdictions.
User generates a Requests for Admission that references two specific contracts and includes a custom limitation to only seek admissions on payment terms.
Paralegal searches for all Word documents that mention "force majeure" and are dated before March 2021.
Senior counsel requests a long‑form summary of a complex multi‑party settlement agreement to extract each party’s obligations.
Attorney asks the AI to tag a document as both "contract" and "confidential" and to provide a confidence rating for each tag.
Partner exports a consolidated DOCX file containing all discovery request drafts generated during the day for final review.
